titleStmt.title: A continuation of the curious collection of paintings and other curiosities; will be sold by auction at the Barbadoes Coffee-House in Exchange Alley, over against the Royal Exchange in Cornhil, on Thursday the 14th of January, and the two following days The sale beginning at four of the clock each afternoon.

notesStmt.note: Probably part of a larger work; the first painting listed is numbered 234.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
